title: In Blazor WebAssembly, how to write a warning or an info?
body:
In Blazor WebAssembly, Console.WriteLine writes a log to the Javascript console, and Console.Error.WriteLine writes an error. Is there any way to write a warning or an info without using Javascript--what is the Blazor equivalent of Javascript console.warn or console.info?

(In general, how can one find out if there is a Blazor alternative to Javascript interop for any given function call?)
